/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The highway is filled with cars and trucks, indicating a busy time of day. Power lines stretch across the background, adding to the urban feel of the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various colors of the vehicles. The image is a snapshot of life in a busy city, with all its movement and energy.
